rows.quiz_1_question: Where will you spend one-on-one time with your child?
rows.quiz_1_feedback_1: Great choice! Spending time at the park is a wonderful way to spend one-on-one time with your child and enjoy some fresh air together.
rows.quiz_1_feedback_2: Perfect! Home is full of opportunities for quality time, whether it's playing, reading, or just relaxing together.
rows.quiz_1_option_3_text: While going to school or daycare
rows.quiz_1_feedback_3: Excellent idea! The journey to school or daycare can be a special time to connect with your child.
rows.quiz_1_feedback_4: Wonderful! No matter where you choose, spending one-on-one time with your child is what truly matters.
rows.quiz_2_question: When will you spend one-on-one time with your child?
rows.quiz_2_option_1_text: In the morning before starting the day
rows.quiz_2_feedback_1: Great start! Spending time with your child in the morning can set a positive tone for the rest of the day.
rows.quiz_2_feedback_2: Perfect! After school or daycare is a great time to reconnect with your child
rows.quiz_2_feedback_3: Wonderful! Sharing a meal together is a special way to bond and enjoy each other's company
rows.quiz_2_feedback_4: Lovely choice! Bedtime is a calming time to connect, share stories, and end the day on a warm note.
rows.quiz_2_option_5_text: During a commute (e.g., driving to school or an activity)
rows.quiz_2_feedback_5: Excellent idea! Commutes are a valuable opportunity to chat and spend meaningful time together
rows.quiz_2_feedback_6: Fantastic! Whatever time you choose, making it a regular part of your routine ensures meaningful one-on-one time with your child.
rows.quiz_3_question: How will you spend one-on-one time with your child today?
rows.quiz_3_feedback_1:
Great idea!

Do you ever feel like you have NO TIME and are exhausted? We’ve all been there! Try to think of ways to make daily activities fun together.
